name: Newstastic Post Slider
author: David Henry

sections.description:
Updated to fix issues with newer versions of PHP. This little widget will display your posts from all or selected categories in a horizonal or vertical format, you can select a few options on what you’d like to show and set the width, height etc. This is a first release so we welcome feedback. If you’d like us to customise it for your site, let us know.

UPDATE | Bug fix release
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. install using the wordpress install function as any other plugin.

  2. Once installed you can add it to your position as a widget, there you will find the various options you can set.
sections.faq:
My images are not loading

We use Tim thumb, on some servers you may need to reset the permissions of the cache folder;)

short_description: A quick way to display your recent posts on any page with a slider for paging.
description:
